description:
L and R have a dream that they made a wish to a genie in a bottle.
Though it does happen occasionally that they have the same dream, this time the content of the wish differs and it throws them for a loop.
Then Atom suddenly announced that their club is to take care of their school`s lunch break broadcast.
With his innately high capacity to adapt, L efficiently takes care of the program`s structure and casting, but it seems R objects to his casting choices...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 昼から放送[おく]るふたご星
